materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1rjhb","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dk2b","text":"1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tubes (022431021 Fisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fhf1","text":"Pierce, protease inhibitor without EDTA (A32965 )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2tub","text":"Pierce, mini-tablets protease inhibitor without EDTA (A32955)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"424fv","text":"for m6A reaction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b5fn","text":"EcoGII/ rCutSmart/ SAM (M0603S New England Biolabs)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk59l","text":"Proteinase K  (25530049 Thermofisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77sd5","text":"RNAse A  (T3018L New England Biolabs)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"140m5","text":"for library preparation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqr7l","text":"NEBNext Companion Module for Oxford Nanopore Ligation Seq (E7180S New England Biolabs)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6g9","text":"SQK-LSK110 (Oxford Nanopore Technologies)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6oh0f","text":"for nanopore sequencing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jkfg","text":"FLO-MIN106.1 or  FLO-PRO002  (Oxford Nanopore Technologies)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"79q1a","text":"Add the powder to 12.5 ml of Extraction Buffer (EB) 1 in a 50 ml falcon tube. Homogenise and let sit on ice for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30gj5","text":"Add 1% Formaldehyde for crosslinking (i.e. 338 µl Formaldehyde 37% in 12.5 ml of EB1). Incubate 5 minutes on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fllm","text":"Add 1.25M glycine to stop the crosslinking (i.e. 850 ml of Glycine 2M per 338 µl Formaldehyde 37%), homogenise well before going throught the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qg6v","text":"Filter the solution through Miracloth into a new 50 ml falcon tube. Repeat once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1c6f","text":"Filter the solution through a 0.4µm filter into a new 50 ml falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8vegp","text":"Centrifuge the filtered solution for 20 minutes at 4,000g at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dfj5","text":"Gently remove the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 2 ml of Extraction Buffer (EB) 2. Transfer the solution into two 1.5ml LoBind Eppendorf tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3akce","text":"Centrifuge at 11,000 g for 10 minutes at 4°C. Repeat step 15 \u0026 16 once","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1p7c","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend each pellet in 300 µl of Extraction Buffer (EB) 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1b715","text":"In two clean 1.5 ml LoBind Eppendorf tubes, add 300 µl of EB3. Take the 300 µl solution (resuspended pellet) from step 17 and carefully layer it on top of the clean 300 µl of EB3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7c54q","text":"Centrifuge for 45 min at 11,000g at 4 degrees.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r1os","text":"Resuspend each chromatin pellet in 300 µl of Nuclear Preparation Buffer (NPB) and incubate on ice for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dl0a","text":"Only one 1.5 ml LoBind Eppendorf tube of chromatin is used for the m6A-MTase reaction and is sufficient to produce enough material for one promethION run; the second tube can be stored at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63rg0","text":"Spin down nuclei at 1000g for 5 min at 4°C and resuspend in 300 µl of Plant-Tween-Wash-Buffer (PTWB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9sgs","text":"Spin down nuclei at 1000g for 5 min at 4°C and resuspend pellet in 380 µl 1X rCutSmart, add 10 µl SAM (32mM) and 6 µl EcoGII (i.e. 7.5U for 100 µl). Incubate 30 minutes at 30°C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dsm","text":"Add  20 µl NaCl (5M) and incubate overnight at 65 °C (or 1h30 if the chromatin has not been cross-linked).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vtbq","text":"Add 5 µl of RNAse A (20mg/ml) and 2 µl Proteinase K (20mg/ml). Incubate 30 minutes at 42°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ok70","text":"Add 1 volume of 1:1 phenol:chloroform (i.e. 400 µl) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"appc1","text":"Recover the aqueous phase (upper) in a new 1.5 ml LoBind Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ru8d","text":"Add 1 volume of chloroform (i.e. 400 µl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"56qs0","text":"Centrifuge at 12,000 g for 10 minutes at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3if4m","text":"Recover aqueous phase (upper) in a new 1.5 ml LoBind Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5a6b","text":"Precipitate DNA by adding 1/10 volume of NaAcétate 3M pH5,2 (ie 40 µl) and 2,5 volume of EtOH 100% (ie 1 ml)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aql4h","text":"Incubate at –20°C from 45 minutes to overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8h20a","text":"Centrifuge at 12000g for 30 minutes at 4°C to precipitate DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7k8v2","text":"Wash the pellet with 300 µl EtOH 70%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"583l2","text":"Remove EtOH and dry pellets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4cde","text":"Elute in 20 µl Tris-HCl 10mM pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fcmas","text":"Centrifuge at 12,000 g for 10 minutes at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5od1o","text":"Sequence during 72h on v9.4.1 flow cell  FLO-MIN106.1 or FLO-PRO002 in MinION or PromethION sequencer, respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a26bo","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hvl1","text":"Extraction Buffer (EB) 1 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c2aj","text":"To prepare 50 ml of fresh EB1 buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brclb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kq9g","text":"   Extraction Buffer (EB) 1for 50 ml:Final Concentration2M sucrose10 ml 0.4M 1M Tris-HCl pH 80.5 ml10mM 1M  MgCl20.5ml 10mM14.3M  BME17.5 µl 5mM+ PIs (1 tablet  per 50mls)","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":171}],"data":{}},{"key":"c0gdd","text":"Fill to 50 ml with distilled water ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":""},"colTitles":["Component","Amount","Final Concentration"],"colWidths":["226.99241638183594",100,"133.99999237060547"],"data":[["2M Sucrose","10 ml","0.4M"],["1M  MgCl2","0,5 ml ","10mM"],["14.3M 2-mercaptoethanol","17,5 µl ","5mM"],["protease inhibitor (PI) ","1 tablet","1X"],[" 1M Tris-HCl pH 8","0,5 ml","10mM "]],"guid":"66AD4AB117C846E7B70223DFE33C5772","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["2M Sucrose","10 ml","0.4M"],["1M  MgCl2","0,5 ml ","10mM"],["14.3M 2-mercaptoethanol","17,5 µl ","5mM"],["protease inhibitor (PI) ","1 tablet","1X"],[" 1M Tris-HCl pH 8","0,5 ml","10mM "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
